name: Self Help
author: Samuel Smiles
description: Self-improvement book, teaching the importance of hard work & self-reliance.

name: Meditations
author: Emperor of Rome Marcus Aurelius
description: It reflects on how to stay calm, strong, and virtuous, even in difficult times.

name: The Sense of Beauty
author: George Santayana
description: Beauty's impact on people, art, and nature.

name: Little Lost Girl
author: Graham Wilson
description: It centers around the mysterious disappearance of young girl-Sophie.

name: Heir To Magic - Book 1
author: Adam K. Watts
description: A spell gone wrong. A teenage girl fighting for survival.

name: The Sea Lady
author: H.G. Wells
description: A man who thinks he is rescuing a woman(mermaid) from drowning.

name: Myth and Science
author: Tito Vignoli
description: Myths & science come from same human need to explain life's mysteries.

name: The Machinery of the Universe
author: Amos Emerson Dolbear
description: Explores mech. & phy. theories of the universe.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temples of Tamil Nadu
author: Brian Thomas
description: Indiana Jones seeks a cursed alien artifact in India.

name: The Art of Interior Decoration
author: Grace Wood and Emily Burbank
description: Interior design guide on color, furniture, and layout for aesthetic spaces...

name: Dare to Dream
author: Malissa Melrose
description: Dare to Dream : The artist's vibrant works, to explore colorful world of the abstract creations.​

name: The Elements of Drawing
author: John Ruskin
description: A guide on drawing technique, observation, and studying nature.

name: The Psychology of Beauty
author: Ethel D. Puffer
description: How humans respond to beauty,tests psychological aspects of experience.

name: Actions and Reactions
author: Rudyard Kipling
description: Explores human nature, impact of actions,& complexities of moral choices​

name: The Time Machine
author: H.G. Wells
description: The Time Machine : The time traveller journeys to the future and how he discovered the divided society .

name: The Colors of Space
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley
description: Science fiction novel that explores interstellar conflict and human-alien relationships

name: Palmistry for All
author: Cheiro
description: Detailed guide to palmistry, teaching how to read hand lines and mounts to predict the future and uncover personality traits.
